com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui

Class OAuthWebviewHelper.AuthWebViewClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • WebViewClient
      • com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.OAuthWebviewHelper.AuthWebViewClient
  • Enclosing class:
    OAuthWebviewHelper

    protected class OAuthWebviewHelper.AuthWebViewClient
extends WebViewClient
    WebViewClient which intercepts the redirect to the oauth callback url. That redirect marks the end of the user facing portion of the authentication flow.
